## ArrayEntry type

return the type of that array's entry.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ArrayEntry<T extends readonly unknown[]> = [number, T[number]]
```

## Example


```ts
type Foo = [1, 2]

// Expect: [number, 1 | 2]
type EntryType = ArrayEntry<Foo>
```
